body.name: AGPTEK Smart Watch, 1.69"(43mm) Smartwatch for Android and iOS Phones IP68 Waterproof Fitness Tracker Watch Heart Rate Monitor Pedometer Sleep Monitor for Men Women

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Rose gold case with pink band

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 5 hrs 14 mins
features: 1.69" HD Screen That Amazes You: View your data in stunning colors, turn-to-life clarity, and expanding horizon thanks to our unprecedented 1.69-inch HD vivid screen with full-touch capabilities. Choosing from the already-present watch faces or downloading a new face from the App, to suit your daily mood and occasion

All-Round Health Management: Keep track of your all-day activities, such as steps, distance, calories burned, as well as your sleep throughout the night, and get deeper insights into your health. Plus female cycle tracking, sedentary reminder, and other health functions, help achieve total health management from your wrist. Take another step towards your health.

Fuel Your Passion For Sports: With 11 sports modes(includes running, cycling, yoga, swimming, etc.), pick up the most of all you like, and take your fitness to a whole new level. Meanwhile, IP68 waterproof level for splash, water, and dust resistance, no need to worry about water splashes or sudden rain.

Keeps You Well-Informed: Get notifications of your incoming calls, texts, messages (like Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, Instagram, etc.) sent to your smartwatch screen, NOTE: THE WATCH CAN NOT MAKE MESSAGES, CALLS or TEXT BACK, Bluetooth distance 8-10 meters and supports iOS 10.0/Android 5.0 or above and Bluetooth 5.0.

Do More, Explore More: Engineered to help you run your day enjoyably, our smartwatch supports working up to 10 days of battery life with a single 2-hour charge, and offers lots of features, such as weather forecasting, alarm clocks, stopwatch, timers, music controller, camera controller, and more, bringing you the maximum convenience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WHY CHOOSE AGPTEK Smartwatch? 1.69-inch HD Screen. All your info, right here in clarity. Personalized Watch Faces. Wear your taste and personality on your wrist. It is rose gold case with a pink band. Optimize Your Sleep. Automatically track your sleep at every stage of sleep (light, deep and wake up) to assist you to improve your sleeping quality. Never Miss A Thing. Notifications of calls, messages, emails, and social Apps, or even alarm, timer, and stopwatch. FOR WHATSAPP, due to the system settings of Whatsapp itself, only one message reminder can be displayed on the watch every day, and the specific content can only be seen by tapping into WhatsApp on the mobile phone. Get Fitter, Get Better. Supports 11 sports modes. Pick your favorite sport, and push you further towards your goal. You Have A Buddy. Want to know your everyday steps, distance, calorie burns, or active time? Just bring the AGPTEK Smartwatch and off you go. Live Free, Splash Away. Get Wet? No Problem! Enjoy your workout in the rain or shallow swimming pool.

Specifications: Display: 1.69’’(43mm) TFT Full Touch Color Screen Resolution: 240*280 Working time: about 7-10 days Size: Watchband: 20mm/0.79in width; Distance of charging points: 2.5mm /0.1in Bluetooth Effective Distance: 8-10m

How to get it to connect to your phone? Open your phone Bluetooth and the APP > Click "Connect a device" on the app to search > choose the LW31 to pair (Don't directly connect the watch in phone bluetooth, it must connect on the app.) Please note that the maximum Bluetooth distance is 8-10 meters.If the app can’t detect the watch, please restart your phone and also reset the watch (Turn on the watch--> Click the ”Settings” icon--> “reset”.) Then try again.If you still can’t connect the watch: please uninstall the app and also delete the "LW31" from the Bluetooth paired list of your phone. Install the app and try again. Note: 1. If you use the charging adapter to charge, the recommended voltage is 5V. DON’T use over 5V/2A power adapter to charge it. 2. Do not use in baths, saunas, hot springs, or other environments with corrosive liquid and hot steam, which will lead to product failure. 3. Don’t operate the watch underwater. 4. Do not wear the watch to deep dive.

Surprise, As Always More practical and comprehensive tools deserve to explore, such as 11 sports modes, sleep tracker, HR monitor, alarm clocks, weather information, brightness adjustment, find phone, etc. Stopwatch & Timer Make your every training or workout counted. These functions help you track and optimize your training effect, taking your training or workout to next level. Tailored to Health Remind you to keep active or drink water per hour after sit and work for a long time, the LW31 helps you develop an energetic and healthy lifestyle!

Control Music & Camera On Your Wrist Connect to the App, and turn on your phone player or App. In the watch, you can not only adjust volume, play/pause, and skip tracks, but also control the phone's camera to record your cherished moment. Smartwatch Straps & Charger Specification Wanna change the new straps? Lost the original magnetic charger? Don't worried about buying the wrong specifications of straps and chargers. Strap: 20mm/0.79in width; Charger: 2.5mm/0.1in gap between only 2 pins. 2 Hours=30 Days No more risk of running out of juice before your day is up. 2 hours of charging provides about 7~10-day use and 30-day standby, which keeps you away from the battery life anxiety.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good product
reviews.reviewText: I made this gift to my wife. It looks very good. The app works perfectly and the smartwatch is durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slim fitting. Attractive. Stays charged a long time. Accurate.
reviews.reviewText: I always wanted a watch to count my steps. But I did not want the hassle ir expense if an Apple watch. This is also a great timer. I use that function frequently. I can read my texts. Cannit respond, but can certainly check in with my phone if necessary. Great value at a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Seems pretty good so far
reviews.reviewText: This watch seems nice for the money. I like touch screen and face. It’s a little bulky. The app is terrible. I don’t like that I have to go through the phone app to set an alarm. Can’t do it directly on the watch. I feel like I should just use my phone at that point. The messages app on the watch is NOT for text messages, it is for emails. That is also a let down

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It tells time
reviews.reviewText: I got this watch/tracker because I needed a simple straightforward tracker. Nothing major. It was a great price and the reviews seemed decent. I wasn't expecting anything like apple but i did expect the product i purchased to do what it says it would.The temperature always reads the same. 73F. I am in Texas and its 99 degrees right now. It never gives accurate weather, at all. There is absolutely no way to sync any messages AT ALL. Even just to view. There is NO MUSIC function at all. No way to sync. There is NO WAY to know what the 1st icon even is for on the dash on the watch bc itsfunction doesn't work.The manual is vague and has obvious translation errors. The Q&A on Amazon is pointless because you can ask a question and they will answer YES, it works or you can do something but in fact it completely DOES NOT.I always try to do my research, regardless of product price. I know nothing is 100% perfect. I get that. But this watch does NOTHING of what it says it will, at least the main points mentioned. You can tell time, you can add a picture and maybe a heart rate, steps. THAT'S IT.BE WARNED. I read the manual and it's not a manual at all.I would not buy this product. Do more searching, I am sure you will find something better.Unless you just want a time clock and a picture, keep going.As far as the company, they shoud be 100% transparent. Alot of what they claim is I. Fact, INACCURATE.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice watch for the price
reviews.reviewText: App was easy to set up. Great watch and works well for the price .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am a bit disappointed with this watch. Everything that I got it for is not working. I can't get notifications for phone and texts and I have all the set up and activated everything I needed too. I even uninstalled app, shut phone and watch off and turned back on and I can't get them to send notifications . I can use it but the two things I really need don't work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The watch is wayyy worth the buy! The battery life is great! It counts steps great and monitors everything pretty good! If you got it for the sleep monitor, then you may want to get one a little more focused on that. I have been using it and it does okay. You have to sync it to your handset and then every night before bed>main menu> swipe left twice past steps and heart monitor to the sleep monitor and make sure you do that before sleep otherwise it will not record. I also downloaded a random sleep monitor to help calibrate my watch. The ovulation and period monitoring is not great so sti I with your own calendar or your handset. Other than that. I had no issues with the temperature or it being in china time zone like others have had complaints about. The battery last for days. I bought it on the 18th of September and didn’t need a charge until the 28th. It has not held the charge that long since. It does last every bit of 5-7 days. Dependent upon yourself and how often you are using it. I would buy it again before I bought an apple for hundreds! The app needs to be updated you can’t add anything in the app to make it sync with the watch so just use your devices health app instead. Hope this helps some. Sorry I was all over the place with this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality..easy to use..and excellent for body material

I got this for my Wife for Christmas. At first I thought the battery was bad, but after reconnecting it to a battery pack 5 volts 2 amp the battery charged up and it has been outstanding. I charged it on the 25th to full charge and my wife has been wearing it everyday and it's at 50% on the 30th.She likes the features of the watch and it looks good, well built.Not sure why the watch would not charge from the USB AC charger. But it just needs to have a compatible charger, the description says 5 volts 2 amp.
buen producto, lo utilizan mis hijos y hasta ahorita han resultado buenos

Mi piace molto il design con i particolari dorati, il cinturino è morbido lo tengo sempre anche mentre dormo sembra di non averlo. Funziona bene, veloce, colori accesi e si collega al telefono con facilità. Raggio del bluetooth abbastanza ampia.
No funciona, no tiene garantia, no tiene Servicio Técnico

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Aesthetically pleasing. Easy to use. Value for money
